website_summaries.verdict: Xbox One X lays a credible claim to the title of most powerful game console ever, but it has an uphill battle for your gaming dollar, especially if you already own an original Xbox One.
pros: The Xbox One X is a powerful step-up console that supports 4K, HDR and offers improved visuals and framerates for certain games
It can play all Xbox One games, some 360 and original Xbox games, and it ships with a 1TB drive
cons: At $500, it's the most expensive game console right now
The list of console-exclusive titles generally falls short of its direct competition, the PS4 Pro
Not every game will receive 4K or HDR enhancements

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this console for my boyfriend, and within three days of setting it up, we started getting error codes. Then the Xbox randomly started shutting off and not turning back on. After two weeks it was basically unusable. I returned it with no problem and received the replacement a few days later. Unfortunately, we had the EXACT same issues with them next console so we returned it for a full refund. I've never had any previous issues with electronics from Amazon, so I was very surprised to have problems with these.
customer_reviews.author: Ebonybeauty92

customer_reviews.title: Already opened box on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even touched this box and the product has clearly been opened and the box was even tore. What's the guarantee it hasn't been used?
customer_reviews.author: SlyNine

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Y'all really just sent me a broken Xbox One X. Just unboxed it and plugged into a brand new 4k TV. The light turns on and it makes the noise but it doesn't connect to the TV and the remote doesn't connect to the Xbox. It wont turn off and I dont want to just unplug it from the power source. This isn't even a slight issue like cosmetic damage or anything. This thing straight up doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: VikkiV

customer_reviews.title: While this looks great in 4k
customer_reviews.text: While this looks great in 4k, the big winner is the performance. Even if you dont own a 4k tv, you can appreciate how much smoother games run on it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jordan

customer_reviews.title: A really well-made console, Microsoft did a great job.
customer_reviews.text: Solid console. Super fast and 4k content is amazing. Bluray works well and is controlled via tv remote. I haven't had a disconnect yet which was a constant problem on my play station. I didn't rate 5 stars due to game controller uses physical batteries instead of rechargeable, however, 2 AA lasted almost 2 weeks on heavy gameplay. A word of caution that 4k consumes massive data, I almost hit my allotment on Xfinity in a month. The games are massive storage hogs and having big Xbox is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Hardcastle K.B.M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last Long!
customer_reviews.text: After just a few months the Console started acting up showing the E101 and E102 error codes at first, eventually evolving into a E105 error code. These suggested hardware issues, and unit had to be sent to Microsoft for repair. The console has a manufacturing date of October 2017, though was sold to me by Amazon in June, 2018. Save yourself the trouble, and buy a new console directly from the Xbox Store.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great system if you can get past the price.
customer_reviews.text: Got this after upgrading to a 4k UHD TV it is way better than what I had ( Original Xbone with old style controller). Games look great in 4k, and everything seems smoother than my old system. It even seems like online functionality is better.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN LAWSON

customer_reviews.title: Xbox One X Crashes 90% of the time
customer_reviews.text: I received a defective Xbox. Freezes and crashes after starting 90% of the time. $500 piece of trash. Have tried every hard reboot, power cycling, cache empty, file transfer available. Severely disappointed. Will likely switch to PS4 permanently.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Without constant WiFi it is just a black brick.
customer_reviews.text: Reviews said I would get better graphics than my ps4 and it is 4hd. What’s not to like? Due to poor internet access I have a four hour window to use this machine and Microsoft then demands a update immediately. So the box does what the master says. And I am locked out until it complete. My experience might be better if I was closer to a cell tower but I think not. FYI won’t play movie discs unless connected to the net. Microsoft needs to know all. Goodwill is going to get a early Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: Bonemouth

customer_reviews.title: Box was open and broken.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new Xbox because i wanted a new Xbox. The box was open and the controller was used and broken. The RB button was stuck down and i had to take apart the controller and fix it. Buy from Microsoft.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Rowe

customer_reviews.title: the graphics (at least in Fortnite) are instantly noticeably better, and it feels really smooth
customer_reviews.text: I've only played 3 games of Fortnite since playing this. Download speeds for games are faster, the graphics (at least in Fortnite) are instantly noticeably better, and it feels really smooth. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Brian

customer_reviews.title: 4K gaming and movies are amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a Xbox gamer since the 360. I had the original fat Xbox 1 and games were starting to get bogged down and crashing, especially the new COD:BO4. I recently upgraded to a 4K tv and figured since the price came down for the start of the holiday season to buy it. All I can say is wow, it was like going from standard definition gaming to HIgh definition all over again. COD:BO4 is running so much better now and hasn’t crashed yet. I would highly recommend the X1X! (Photo shows Directv box on top of the Xbox 1 X.)
customer_reviews.author: Dakuyellow

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know untill too late
customer_reviews.text: Xbox One X came on time, and thought it worked fine until I tried to play a forza horizon game on it which caused a loss of sound and game crashes making that particular xbox staple unplayable, even after tons of troubleshooting, reinstalls, and factory resets. But it turns out all nextgen large open world games cause this problem, this is supposed to be the upgraded system. Now I can't progress in red dead redemption 2, really wish I had discovered this console was defected during the return period.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Xbox One X can't survive a 10 foot throw
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on the One X. The photo is the current state of mine after Microsoft wouldn't fix the constant crashing and freezing and instead told me to buy a refurbished One X after 18 months. I reformatted it 3 times. Finally had enough and threw it across my basement. Purchased in February 2018.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this this is pure magic I own the first edition Xbox One and I didn't buy the Xbox One S or anything like that I was hoping that something like this would come out I made the switch from the Xbox One to the Xbox One X and could tell the difference when playing Assassin's Creed origins or any other enhance Xbox game especially on a 4K UHD TV I would advise everyone to upgrade to this it is just amazing the biggest issue I had was setting my TV to True UHD so that the 4K would enable on the Xbox which I just did a simple Google search and took me 2 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: people should be made aware that you need internet to get set up
customer_reviews.text: got my son this for christmas he has as of yet been able to use it as i did not know that internet was needed to do set up so now have to take the xbox elsewhere to do first time set up then hope it works when get it back home. a heads up would sure have been nice did the 1st time set up over the weekend and now see that not only do you need internet to do set up but appears that also need internet to install games that are on a disk that was bought what a crock this xbox is turning out to be a nightmare
customer_reviews.author: paul ashenbrenner

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the “open stock “ from amazon
customer_reviews.text: Order the open boxes item from amazon to save a few bucks... I’ve started to realize that when they say open box it just means the box is slightly damaged. But to the info of the Xbox One X... love it! Makes PUBG and Fortnite load super quick and the graphics are stunning. For PUBG the rendering of the landscape is done before you need to jump. You can even tell that a bush is a bush! No more praying that the one object off in the distance you see isn’t a guy!
customer_reviews.author: DeeBroadway

customer_reviews.title: but still a great item to own
customer_reviews.text: Probably not a necessary upgrade from a standard XB1, but still a great item to own. Responsive, good update management (you're not installing an update every time you try to use it like other consoles), will allow resume on more than one game, and currently has the best controller on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade to make use of 4K TV
customer_reviews.text: Great improvement over the 'S' model on my OLED. Middle Earth Shadow of War looks amazing! MS did a good job speeding up the interface. Console runs very quietly and is easily the best designed Xbox in the lineup. Really looking forward to more 4K games!
customer_reviews.author: Jrod

customer_reviews.title: multiple errors and now it's dead
customer_reviews.text: I have been an xbox player from the beginning and never had so many problems with an xbox. 3 months in and I have already factory reset once, and hard resetting >6 times just so it will start up is the norm. I am so sad that I purchased this without support as I have never needed it until now. I have searched all the forums and unfortunately I think my xbox is faulty so I will have to send it in for repairs. Advice, purchase any unlimited service plans and warranties.
customer_reviews.author: R. Richards

customer_reviews.title: What a waste!
customer_reviews.text: Wasted countless hours resetting and trying to fix constant problems with local storage, no signal on HDMI, etc. This is the most frustrating piece of junk I have ever had
customer_reviews.author: Ruslan Sudentas

customer_reviews.title: Returned, did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't even run Halo: Master Chief Collection without crashing and requiring a complete system reset. Guaranteed scam Xbox, most likely containing Chinese internals.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Paid for used console, received brand new one.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a used like new Xbox one X but I got a brand new one! Came in original box, box was opened and a little rough on the edges, but console and controller were in the original packaging, they work perfectly fine and don't even have a scratch on them. The package seems like someone opened it just to get the free month of gold but I don't care about that, I paid for a used console and got a brand new one!
customer_reviews.author: MitchiWhite

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband while he was away 7 months ago, he got to use it about 10x since then with work trips and spending time with our family... it randomly would not work and now it just doesn’t work so I came to look at the listing and it says discontinued... just a little shady
customer_reviews.author: B Family

customer_reviews.title: Does not stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.text: A year and a half into ownership of the most expensive console - the HDMI port is dead and frequently overheats while sitting on top of my desk with perfect airflow. The console is on a quality surge protector. I think quality control at foxcon is garbage. I now have to shell out 250 dollars to get the console replaced or repaired. 400 dollar consoles should not die after a year and a half of light use.
customer_reviews.author: B. Stumpp

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Like too many others mine was DOA. The bright side of the experience is that returning it was painless - UPS came to the house and picked it up and Amazon issued me a credit within 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent system for me a must have 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Xbox One x from Amazon next day it came the next day. Packing was good. Box was unharmed. And using the x box, one x compared to the issues I was having with the original Xbox One. All all the issues went away. Frame rate went smooth. The graphics were noticeably better. In the game stopped freezing up. I have nothing but good to say about this new system. I also purchased a 2 terabyte external hard drive. So I could transfer my data between systems. Load times are noticeably quicker. Just a fantastic system. Thank you, Microsoft. And you to Amazon?
customer_reviews.author: David Kniss

customer_reviews.title: Know your seller!!
customer_reviews.text: Xbox is an Xbox. Be very weary of who you buy it from. Mine was supposed to be new and came with contents spilled into a box that's too big with teo small pieces of foam and paper with all the contents of the original box spilled inside. You can see spots in it where during shipping the console smashed side to side potentially damaging it. I decided not to trust it and to return it without testing. Totally unacceptable. Be wary of Neobahamutz as seller.
customer_reviews.author: 3dprintinggamer

customer_reviews.title: If your a pc person stick with it, not even close by comparison
customer_reviews.text: I was a pc person. I kept hearing good things about Xbox. Please stay with your pc. Xbox is the single worst decision in my financial life. The controller is awful, I hate everything about it. The joy sticks on the controller are terrible. Worst reactionary play ever. Basically I bought a 400 plus dollar DVD player. Going to sell it asap
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: All pro’s, No cons! (:
customer_reviews.text: I was paranoid of ordering this at first as a gift just because of the technical issues people were having with their Xbox and thinking it could be damaged through process and handling since mailmen can throw packages at times. But I am more than satisfied with my purchase. It came in brand spanking new, with Xbox live gold and a game pass. It was well packaged and secured. It came with a remote. It started up perfectly and has been working great since! I recommend to everyone reading my review to give it a chance because every online purchase can have its pros and cons. But this one was definitely all pro! Thank you so much, happy holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Not meant to be
customer_reviews.text: Bought one, stopped working after a couple months. Sent it back to Microsoft to be fixed. They sent it back, still broken. Replaced it on Amazon with a new one. The second one lasted me around a year, and then stopped working as well. Long story short, get a PS4 Pro. Side note: I have a base Xbox One from 2013 and it still works perfectly to this day.
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Ordered first console for my son and a month after ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered first console for my son and a month after using it, it died. It would not turn on. So frustrating babease you spend so much money on these consoles that you would think that these companies would have it together. It's just a make as much money as we can from the consumer even though the components are inferior. On the upside, Amazon refunded us immediately and we ordered another console. Hopefully this one isn't a lemon as well.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: When you feel that you only have 2GB of RAM instead of 12GB
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a sonyboy but this system cannot be compared to PS4 Pro in regard of smoothness and responsiveness. The main menu is slow and complicated. Microsoft always makes glitchy operating systems no matter what. Watching 4k movies is a big hassle. During 2 different movies the system froze at least 5 times without any way to get around the glitch unless you hard reboot it. My suggestion to you - if you had previously been playing PS4 or its Pro version, then you are gonna hate this system and return it back.
customer_reviews.author: Vugar Abbasov

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but I got my moneys worth.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly. Arrived in good working condition. Has seen a average of 20 to 50 hours of use per week for the last 3 months without any problem. With and without a 4k television the upgraded graphics and preformance are noticable. I wasnt sure if I was going to get more for my money, but after focusing on xbox one enhanced/4k games and streaming services I am very satisfied with my purchase. If you are a xbox owner considering the upgrade, and youre committed to the console for the forseable future, buy. PUBG, Monster Hunter World, Netflix, and many other enhanced features/ titles are much more enjoyable in contrast to their standard xbox one versions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my fiance to replace his Xbox One. He absolutely loves the One X. I like it too for watching movies. Blu rays look way better even on our non-4K TV, however I'm looking forward to getting a 4K TV now that we have the Xbox One X. As far as gaming quality he says that he hasn't come across any issues and the new COD looks really cool and doesn't lag. It costs a lot, but I think overall it is worth it since we will be using it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed - another good warehouse purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice game console. Purchased used but looks new. Everything was included and works perfectly. Warehouse deals have been consistently good and I have been buying many items used. I did need to update the xbox and controller. It is possible the person that previously purchased it didn't know that the controller needed to be updated before it could be used ( plugged in by USB, updated, then connected to Bluetooth). It has been used almost daily and is working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: K Guillory

customer_reviews.title: Best Xbox yet!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big Xbox fan and have owned every Microsoft Xbox since the original. In this generation I owned both the original Xbox one and now the Xbox one X. The Xbox one X is a big increase in processing power. I already have a large library of games and without having to purchase all new ones I am able to see huge benefits and experience greater immersion of my already favorite games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works...
customer_reviews.text: The system is impressive when it works... I've had the xbox less than a month and have problems. I'm not sure if it is my controller or the system but even though the light on the controller stays on it frequently disconnects. I've tried following the different helps I could find and nothing has worked so far... Everything, including the controller, have the most recent updates. Needless to say this is ridiculous for a system I've had less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I’m beyond happy I received the product on time and I loved it. That image is 4K and I love it . Worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a One S when it first came out and wanted the One X when that came out cause of its high specs, finally bough it on black Friday for $399 and am totally happy with my purchase! I noticed a significantly higher difference in graphics between the two machines while playing Red Dead Redemption 2, love this one x so much! Still kept my one s, just moved it out to my loving room. Awesome machine, very powerful!
customer_reviews.author: OOMPA

customer_reviews.title: Fast loading, smooth processing, powerful console.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a monster. I load in astronomically faster to games and lobbies than any of my friends, and I can noticeably tell the difference in how well games run on this console. It is a must have for the console gamer trying to increase performance and increase satisfactory gameplay!
customer_reviews.author: Miles Kamaloski

customer_reviews.title: Constantly Locks up. NO support from Microsoft
customer_reviews.text: Ultra disappointed in the Xbox one X. Unit will lock up every 30 seconds to a minute. Most games will not even open. Every few minutes the unit will shut down due to overheat errors even though the console is in open air and well ventilated. I have sent this unit back to Microsoft and they send it back claiming the unit is fine and all the diagnostic tests they run check out fine. I ended up buying a normal Xbox one (Not the X) and it works just fine. Never had it lock up once.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: It's fast!
customer_reviews.text: Played with the regular XBox One S for a while and I thought that since the X runs in 4K, that the actual performance would be the same or even slower. But no, it's actually faster in all respects, and is in 4K. The first XBox One X I got had very bad coil whine. If yours does, exchange it! My new one has a very quiet fan sound but nothing like the whirrr it used to have.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Co

customer_reviews.title: I bought for the 4k
customer_reviews.text: If you have the extra cash than buy it. I have a 1500$ PC and it can run some games at 4k, all games at 1080 ultra. The reason this console can do it with ease it because its had a lot more optimization. All my windows games and Xbox games run at 4k with ease. IDK how they did it but they did, and for just 495$ For 495 you won't find a 4k machine.
customer_reviews.author: Nagol

customer_reviews.title: Old out-of-warranty product sold as new
customer_reviews.text: This console was sold as new but was manufactured in 2017 and the warranty had expired before we purchased it in December 2019. We only learned this when we contacted Microsoft because the product did not work and we provided the serial number to Microsoft. I consider this a fraud on an unsuspecting buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Black screen of Death
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 original Xbox One consoles that still work great but this "better" console only lasted a year and a half!? Video started flickering on and off during play the other day. I powered it on today and have the dreaded no signal/black screen. Tried all the YouTube suggestions for hard reset and low-res mode boot, but nothing works. Warranty expired 5 months ago, which is very disappointing. Opening a repair with Microsoft for $250 isn't wise, as I bought an Xbox One S last Black Friday for $155 shipped. I was getting excited to buy the newest version this year, Series X, but this let-down has changed my mind. I won't purchase Xbox equipment in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hammond

customer_reviews.title: When it works it's great, otherwise...
customer_reviews.text: If you aren't aware the Xbox One X models have an issue where the HDMI port will suddenly stop working. Mine is no exception. I wish I would have known this going into it. Paying $500 for something that stops working is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful machine
customer_reviews.text: Believe all the other reviews. I traded in a fairly new Xbox One S to buy this and it's one of the best purchases I've ever made. I'm in love. (The S is a great machine in its own right - I don't mean to disparage it at all. But it's no X.)
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Probably best for the hardcore gamer.
customer_reviews.text: Physically, I like the smaller footprint of the console. I often play at my buddy’s house and this console is a lot easier to manage. As for its other features like higher processing speeds and 4K video, I haven’t noticed any difference. It could be that I don’t play any games that require those features. I have a 4K TV, but my games are not. Overall, I don’t notice a difference between the Xbox One and the Xbox One X. I don’t regret my decision to upgrade, but unless you have a need for the X’s “features”, I would hold up on buying one. Again, I have no regrets and I do like the smaller footprint.
customer_reviews.author: David Lopez

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Great product! If you like Xbox, you’ll love this. I had an experience worth sharing as well: a lightning surge fried my first One X (while it was hooked up to a surge protector). After a phone call or two, I got a replacement for the price of shipping and a week or two wait. Definitely would recommend if you want a gaming console or even just to watch HQ videos. It’s quiet and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable improvement
customer_reviews.text: Received and setup system. Kept on crashing while playing games. Reset the system and reinstalled software but still gave me issues. Requested an exchange and in true Amazon fashion fast turnaround. 2nd unit came and factory box was damaged but did not affect the console. Noticeable improvement from Gen one overall in graphics and overall performance.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Its Broken
customer_reviews.text: The Xbox had been working well, it was fast, reliable and fun to play. One day I got a startup error, I reset the xbox and nothing worked. I tried the remove everything option, but in a few days, the error popped up again and again. This had happened occurred before 6 months of ownership. I'm disappointed about it's random errors and it cannot be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: XBOX One X is AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was worth the wait, graphics on a 4K TV is amazing, surround sound and the Dolby free app.....I'm like a kid in Christmas time, Gears of War 4, Halo 5 and Killer Instinct load super fast and plays flawless..A Christmas must have for any true Gamer!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Salas

customer_reviews.title: Received a used Xbox one x NBA 2k2019 version without game code
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a regular Xbox One X and got an Xbox One X NBA 2K 19 version with no NBA 2K 19. I would have thought about keeping it until I realized the box was open and the NBA 2K 19 redeem code had already been taken out. Which basically means the console is used or a refurb. Not what I expect from a product that is amazon fullifllied. Paying for a new Xbox One X and getting a used one. Unacceptable. Unacceptable. Unacceptable. It's great having to tell your kids on Christmas you have to return their most exciting gift............
customer_reviews.author: GiannijoedevNYC

customer_reviews.text: The Xbox One X is beautiful and sleek. The picture quality is AMAZING. I see such a difference from my previous Xbox One. I honestly think it’s worth more than the price they’re asking. It feels crazy to say that because I am a frugal person. But it is literally the best quality I’ve seen in a console. I bought it for my boyfriend and he’s more than happy with it! He highly recommends anybody to buy this Xbox. It also came with a badass controller. I got it in all black and I think it compliments our living room nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Rushing

customer_reviews.title: No warranty, expired 6 months before we bought it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in April 2020 (for $323 it's now much more). It's having problems where it turns off randomly. We went to our Microsoft account to try to get it serviced. To find that the warranty expired in October 2019 - 6 months before we bought it! That's crazy. I bought it new, I expected it to come with a normal warranty. It worked fine until this past week. The seller doesn't control the quality of the hardware, it's not their fault it's having this glitch. The seller does control selling it with an already expired warranty.
customer_reviews.author: megbuker

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a week. Then it won't turn on. Do not buy, I know its cheaper than other versions but that's because it's an old faulty version of the console, or it's used. Going to return and get an Xbox directly from Microsoft, at least then they will fix it for me.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for $374 using Prime. A big upgrade compared to the Xbox One S model. Works great with my Vizio 4k 50" with HDR and 120hz refresh. Games start up faster, load times are shorter (internet-300mbps dl speed). Movies (DVD, Blu-Ray, 4K UHD) and streaming look great. Still the same complaint as always with Xboxs... no built in rechargeable batteries. Come on Microsoft, get your head out of the clouds, and upgrade the controllers!
customer_reviews.author: Eldon J

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few days. Stay away.
customer_reviews.text: Set everything up and was working fine for a few days. Then out of nowhere it would connect to the internet even tho it was hard wired in. Woildnt let me sign in my account and kept freezing when I tried to start a game. Had to factory reboot twice. Returned to amazon and got a new one from eb games.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Item does not work properly
customer_reviews.text: This item has not worked properly since I purchased it. It continuously freezes on every single game. I have done a factory reset several times erased all of my content and replaced at all. Getting a hold of Xbox is a worthless endeavor I would not buy this unit it has several problems. Check around on the Internet and you will see several people having the same issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Anyone want a slightly used xbox onex in a month or so?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just for Red Dead 2. No regrets
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: I love my X (Not my ex)
customer_reviews.text: After getting my PS4 account hacked into from identity theft,,,, Sony basically shut me down and I lost everything. They wanted me to pay for all the worthless junk someone ordered or lose my account. All my games I bought, my year of Plus, all gone. I already had an Xbox One, but I bought this X and I love it. I didnt realize how much better it was on my 4K TV than my xbone and PS4 pro was. As far as im concerned, it beats my PS4 pro in every aspect. Games look better, the console itself is easier to operate, the controllers feel better, whats not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Not an amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Never once saw a wifi network even though my 1s sitting in it's exact same place saw 6 networks to connect to. Controller randomly disconnects from time to time when batteries are full... Also sometimes the dish tray starts making loud noises and I have to eject the dish and hard reset to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Venegoni

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend purchasing from this merchant
customer_reviews.text: Product advertised was a new Xbox. What I received was a used Xbox. Box was damaged and seals broken. Box advertised a free game that was not included. After calling Microsoft I was able to determine that the Xbox had been registered and the warranty initiated. Only 5 months were remaining on the 2 year manufacturer warranty. I do not recommend purchasing from this merchant
customer_reviews.author: Will Cage

customer_reviews.title: Best console since backward compatible PS3
customer_reviews.text: Quiet Powerful Dual band WiFi HDMI pass through Semi backward compatible (PS4 misses out) 4k gaming Hdr gaming 4k hdr blu Ray (PS4 misses out) DLNA media streaming (PS4 misses out) Plays Music CDs (PS4 misses out) Halo series Forza Motorsport 5 through 7 Forza Horizon 1 through 4 Gears of War series If your into popular exclusives
customer_reviews.author: Dh

customer_reviews.title: The Premium Gaming Console
customer_reviews.text: I recently upgraded from my fully functional Xbox One Day One console to a Xbox One X. The design is beautiful and more compact but more importantly what's inside is even more remarkable. The graphics and performance are the best on the market right now. Coupled with the best online service with Xbox Live and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Not used but broken and doa
customer_reviews.text: Product stated good condition but would get constant errors. Packaging was also banged up. Sad part is the Xbox was direct from amazon! Would give 0 stars if I could. Returning has been a nightmare. Taking over 3 weeks to even try and get a refund. They even tried to state the xbox was not the one sent even though it was the exact one sent to me i returned. The device was defective out of the box. Would never buy used game system from amazon warehouse again or any other electronic.
customer_reviews.author: Josh da lemon

customer_reviews.title: Worth the upgrade? Probably not.
customer_reviews.text: Had an Xbox One S. Didn't notice much of an improvement. It was probably honestly a waste of money. Good console but not enough of an improvement from the One S.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: An amazing machine if you're an xbox fan
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Not much else to say. Renders game beautifully, loads MUCH faster, incredibly quiet. Going from a launch xbox one to this made an incredible difference.
customer_reviews.author: Hostile

customer_reviews.title: 4K is Great! Solid FPS is Better!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic upgrade from a “Day One” edition XBone. Some reviews made me nervous where they claim that theirs was previously open. In my case the worries were unfounded. The 4K looks great obviously but the rock solid frame rate is where this continues to shine. No more slow-downs when there’s a lot going on on the screen. Load times are faster but not significantly changed for me.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Deibler-Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Was originally wondering if the $500 price tag was worth it seeing as I already had Xbox One S. Very glad I decided to upgrade. The new games that have come out September-November are absolutely gorgeous (Assassin's Creed Origins, Forza 7, COD WW2, Battefront 2, and Wolfenstein 2). Not to mention that quite a few games that have been out for a while have updates supporting Xbox One X enhancements.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Best console by far.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a PlayStation gamer as I've always been. However, I like having all three systems (Xbox and Nintendo) so I'm not limited when there are exclusives. I bought this just for the 4k player and a few exclusives, i.e. SOD2. However, when compared side by side with a PS4 Pro it's not even close. It blows it out of the water in every single aspect. I now find myself trading in PS4 titles for the same game on the 1X so I can enjoy REAL 4K HDR gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Bought Used-Like New
customer_reviews.text: Only a couple of minor complaints that resulted in a reduction of a Star. First con was the gash/scratch underneath the console (which does not bother me any because nobody can see underneath the xbox one x). Secondly, there was no cable for the controller. This was easily remedied since i own 2 controllers/cables & 3 rechargeable batteries already for my pc. Everything else looks to be stable. So far it seems to be a good buy, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jose O.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal but should have waited for Scarlett in a year
customer_reviews.text: I was planning to go from Xbox one to the S, but I had such a hard time I decided to spend the extra money for the X. So good so far. Sucks last gen games sometimes freeze when playing on the X but that is probably a developer issue not the console itself. Looks way better with a 4K tv. Update: system works fine most of the time, but I get random freezing and crashing which powers off the system. Nice now that it’s too late to do anything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Ward

customer_reviews.title: My my product came in pretty fast the quality on it is awesome and there's ...
customer_reviews.text: My my product came in pretty fast the quality on it is awesome and there's not really anything I don't like on it.I would have given it a 5 star but the packaging was poorly done my xbox was bouncing all over the place .
customer_reviews.author: michael aguirre

customer_reviews.title: not backwards compatible and requires a home network to even start.
customer_reviews.text: Does not play Skyrim 360. Said it was backyards compatible. Does not copy games via USB. Have to sign up for Xbox gold. The free trial in the box had expired. Requires internet just to start, and downloaded 4 GB of updates. I just bought this because the hard drive in the 360 went out. Thought it would load faster. But with the network requirements (no home network) and the fact I can't play my 360 games on it, I am giving it a shot of 1. This is not an upgrade to an existing system, it is not backwards compatible and requires a home network to even start.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: The most POWERFUL CONSOLE
customer_reviews.text: I can't handle the power. My cat tries to sleep on the console and is suddenly awaken from the sheer magnitude of this console. Bought a new 55 inch 4k television to go with it, and it's visually stunning. Games play smoother, older games have a solid resolution upgrade. Framerates are improved also. It has become the alpha in our household and we fold to it's every need and desire. FEEL THE POWER!
customer_reviews.author: P Theimer

customer_reviews.title: An excellent console - well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: The look and performance of the console so far has been excellent. The game selection is great. Backward compatibility and a 4K bluray player were major pluses that truly set this console apart from my PS4. Overall this was a very worthwhile upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Spectator 21

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Failures after only 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The 5 stars is for Microsoft Support. They were amazing in getting a replacement sent out to me. I'm military and ordered this for my troops at our deployment. We were alittle upset it failed so quickly, considering my Day One edition Xbox is still alive and well, albeit alittle slow. I would make sure you do not have a bad system, as apparently there was a batch that have HDD Failures like ours.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew E. Mason, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: One box to rule them all!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome console that arrived in two days. A joy to play new and old xbox games with enhanced graphics. If you have to pick just one console you will not be disappointed with the One X baby!
customer_reviews.author: R.B.

customer_reviews.title: Glorious
customer_reviews.text: This Xbox One X was the first purchase to my "4k upgrade". I still need the TV but the Box works phenomenally. It loads and runs faster than my original Xbox One (I set two TVs up and ran them side by side with the same game). Highly recommend this Xbox but then again there is talks of a new console coming out that I am pretty excited for!
customer_reviews.author: bsimm22

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, but beware possibly spotty hardware
customer_reviews.text: Runs games faster, looks great. Mine seems to have something wrong with the ethernet port. If I have it plugged in,it will drop my connection about 5 minutes after powering on. It only drops for a second, but since basically every game is connecting to a server for something, it will usually kick me to the menu. I switched to wireless, and am not seeing that behavior any more. There's a work-around, but something this expensive shouldn't have that sort of issue, honestly
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bardolph

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy issues immediately
customer_reviews.text: HDMI port issue!!! I’ve owned this for a week now and it’s to the point where the Xbox is unplayable. I’ve tried multiple monitors and a tv, as well as tried several HDMI cords. I was sold a defective product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Rocco

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We were a bit skeptical of buying this product mainly because we've always bought our gaming electronics in GameStop for years now but with this quarantine and lack of product availability in the stores we had no choice but to resort to online shopping and we are glad we did, so far it's been working great. Fast delivery as well! Very grateful and satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: YPM

customer_reviews.title: Casual gamer super computer
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Not one issue with this console. Works very fast loads everything quickly and not a single problem with it since I got it months ago. I would highly recommend this high powered console for the casual gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Arrived as described and in a timely manner. I would definitely recommend those looking for electronics a good price with speedy ship to shop here!
customer_reviews.author: Glenna Landry

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular Xbox system. This is amazing when connected to my 4K TV. The graphics are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wish i could give 0 stars
customer_reviews.text: From the moment we got this xbox everything has been very laggy and crashing whenever we play a game. Then a few weeks ago the xbox wouldnt connect to the tv. We tried multiple hdmi chords and everything that Microsoft suggested. We finally took it to a repair shop and they said they wouldn't fix it because its a problem with a chip or mother board or something like that, and that the xbox 1 x has this happen to it all the time! So NEVER get this stupid console. Get a PS4 or something!
customer_reviews.author: Daisie

customer_reviews.title: Works great; easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Works great; easy to set up. If two people are going to use it at same time get a second controller. For me it works best with XBox Live Gold.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Johnson

customer_reviews.title: reviews worried me, but my console is great
customer_reviews.text: (5/18/2020) I've been spending more time reading amazon reviews for electronics, and it seems like a lot of people are getting bad consoles (or maybe damaged during shipping, who knows...). Mine is a positive review because it's working perfectly. I've been able to do everything my old xbox could do and I haven't run into a single issue. I guess I got lucky... I didn't mind rolling the dice on this since amazon is pretty good about returns and it's not like this is a critical purchase. If it's a lemon and I have to return it and buy another one... it's fine. I got quarantine time.
customer_reviews.author: Hart

customer_reviews.title: Good Upgrade For 4k Gaming
customer_reviews.text: Bought to play 4k games and TV. Works well after getting 4k settings tuned to my receiver and projector setup. Can take some time to get this correctly setup. Loads games faster than Xbox One S with excellent 4k picture quality. Worth the upgrade when paired with a 4k display.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back
customer_reviews.text: It was refurbished and defective. Sent it back. Made the screen red
customer_reviews.author: kasey

customer_reviews.title: The console looks amazing, and everything runs quite smooth
customer_reviews.text: The console looks amazing, and everything runs quite smooth, I recently had an interesting glitch however on the dash, it froze for like 15 seconds, at least 3 times... anyone else experiencing this issue? It was when I was downloading SW Battlefront 2... not sure if it was a memory cache issue or something with the dash itself... Idk Other than that it has beautiful graphics that you can tell are a step up from the One S depending on the game your playing and the type of 4K tv you have.
customer_reviews.author: Taj Chaitan

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 6 months, seller won’t replace
customer_reviews.text: Console worked great for 6 months and then suddenly started malfunctioning (HDMI connectivity). Had geek squad come out and try to fix it (swapped cables, swapped TVs, messed with video fidelity settings, etc) and nothing fixed it. Eventually they told me to see about getting a replacement, because it was apparently a problem with the Xbox itself. Contacted the seller and they said no. “The item is past amazon return timeframe”. Okay, but Microsoft gives them a 24 month auto warranty on new consoles. It should cost them nothing to help me out. Don’t buy here or if you do get the extended warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Reina

customer_reviews.title: The Xbone X 4k ultra uff! Looks amazing!👍
customer_reviews.text: Xbox one x endeed the most poweful console out there...i have a ps4 pro but i play more on my xbox one x...
customer_reviews.author: TONIGAME1980

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. Faulty consoles being sold.
customer_reviews.text: Like many others on here I too received a faulty Xbox. Since day one it has continually given me the black screen of death when connecting to 4K, likely due to a faulty hdmi port on the console. Now after a few months it has completely kicked the bucket. It will no longer connect to my tv at any resolution. I have tested it on multiple TVs using multiple hdmi cables and it is without a doubt a faulty console.
customer_reviews.author: will shanklin

customer_reviews.title: Great seller!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, I couldn't tell that it was not brand new. There weren't any issues with the Xbox One X. 2 day shipping!! Only point of notice other than a pleased customer. The controler had one defect, which is a bit annoying when I notice it. However it does not decrease the playability of the controler.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Bouffard

customer_reviews.title: Power to the player
customer_reviews.text: If you want the best gaming experience then this is the best route even if you're a PlayStation fan I recommend getting this console the prices for Xbox one x is going down and having a true 4K gaming experience is great and in all honesty Microsoft has the most exclusives to be pacific most of them are on the Xbox 360 but they're all compatible but the Xbox one x and so are the original Xbox games and most of them are extremely cheap this is the best route to go
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Suspecious conditions.
customer_reviews.text: Received the product and I noticed that both of the manufacture's seals were wrinkled as if had been opened before, so far did not noticed anything wrong, but it's very suspicious. I will update if anything is found, and will follow up with formal complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moved back to Xbox camp due to how incredible this system is.
customer_reviews.text: Best hardware I've seen in a home console! Looks incredible on my 1080p plasma. Night and day difference. The system Xbox should have released in the first place. Ready to get a 4K OLED next year. Only downside is Microsoft needs to get back to creating exclusive games outside of the couple dated feeling franchises they seem to depend on. Fallout 4 is like a new game it looks so incredible along with ffxv, Wolfenstein 2, Halo, Gears and Forza. Also, I was blown away by how good old games look. Soul Caliber IV and Ninja Gaiden Black look almost like modern games!
customer_reviews.author: BeKindToAll

product_meta.title: Xbox One X 1TB Console
product_meta.description: Edition:X 1TBThe world's most powerful Console. Games play better on Xbox One x. With 40% more power than any other Console, experience immersive true 4K gaming. Blockbuster titles look great, run smoothly, and load quickly even on a 1080p screen. Xbox One x also works with all your Xbox One games and accessories as well as Xbox live, the most advanced multiplayer network, giving you more ways to play. Broadband internet required (ISP fees apply). online multiplayer requires Xbox live Gold subscription (sold separately - ISP fees may apply)
feature_bullets: Play on the world’s most powerful console. Experience 40% more power than any other console
Games play better on Xbox One X. 6 teraflops of graphical processing power and a 4K Blu-ray player provides more immersive gaming and entertainment
Play with the greatest community of gamers on the most advanced multiplayer network
Works with all your Xbox One games and accessories
Great for 1080p screens-games run smoothly, look great, and load quickly

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
